title: THE SECRET TO PLANTING GARLIC FOR PROFIT (AND SAVING YOUR SEED)

tasks.task: Plant and cultivate garlic for commercial purposes.
subtasks: Sterilize seed garlic by soaking in vodka.
Prepare compost tea with fish emulsion and mycorrhizal inoculant.
Plant garlic cloves in deep compost mulch with appropriate spacing.
Apply insect netting to protect garlic from pests.
Remove scapes to increase bulb size.
Harvest garlic when leaves turn brown.
Cure garlic in a controlled environment to prevent mold and spoilage.
Store cured garlic in a cool dry place.

tasks.task: Prepare and manage garden beds for garlic cultivation.
subtasks: Apply tarping and cover cropping to suppress weeds.
Use sheet mulch and companion planting to improve soil health.
Construct raised beds with proper drainage.
Apply compost and wood chips as mulch.
Irrigate and monitor plant growth without overwatering.
Implement mechanical weed control measures.
Hand-pull weeds if necessary.

tasks.task: Manage garden infrastructure.
subtasks: Transport materials to leased property.
Measure and mark planting beds accurately.
Use manual tools to plant garlic cloves.
Organize compost tea treatment containers.
Manually soak and plant garlic cloves with compost tea.
Prepare storage crates for harvested garlic.
Install and operate dehumidifier and ventilation system for curing.

tasks.task: Handle and process garlic scapes for market.
subtasks: Collect and prepare garlic scapes for sale.
Package and distribute garlic scapes or use them in cooking.

tasks.task: Market and distribute garlic products.
subtasks: Plan and harvest garlic according to demand.
Package and store garlic bulbs for long-term sale.
